metadata.title: EVOS Contamination Collection Sites

creators.name: Atmospheric Administration (NOAA), National Marine Fisheries Service (NMFS)

metadata.description: Data Type: Exxon Valdez Oil Spill;  This data set depicts the locations of contamination sites collected for Exxon-Valdez Natural Resource Damage Assessment and restoration projects. Data includes hydrocarbon sample sites each with a date location and species from which hydrocarbon sampling was taken. The oracle database contains over 40,000 samples obtained in the spill impacted area and the results of the hydrocarbon analysis of over 13,000 samples.
